msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts
msIdentifier.idno: Misc Mss Box 24 Folder 3 Box 24 Folder 3

msContents.summary: Three leaves containing sections of two commentaries on the Alfīyah of Ibn Mālik, the leaves do not read continuously. One commentary is in the main textblock and the other is in the margin.

msItem.title: Selections from commentaries on Alfīyat Ibn Mālik.

author.persName: Ibn Mālik, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, -1274
ابن مالك، محمد بن عبد الله،

msItem.title: [Selections from commentaries on Alfīyat Ibn Mālik].

supportDesc.foliation: Western numeral foliation in pencil added, upper left recto.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in clear maghribi in black ink, pointed, partially vocalized.

origin.p: Probably produced in North Africa in the 16th or 17th century.
